wikipedia_page.main: James "Jem" Wharton (3 March 1813 — 25 April 1856) was an English boxer. Wharton boxed from 1833 to 1840 and had a career record of eight wins and one draw. He was posthumously inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame in 2012.

response: * James Wharton, Baron Wharton of Yarm (born 1984), British politician
* James Wharton (author) (born 1987), author and LGBT activist
